phrases: living your life do not give up now keep moving on
kimi wo dakishimeru nandomo nandomo nandomo
ashita boku wa kimi ni deau darou
boku ni wa kimi ga wakaru yo wakaru yo
sen'oku no toki wo koe futari hiraku densetsu no tobira
kimi to hai ni naru tame
nagaki rinne wo kanashimi tsurete tabi shitekitanda
zenryoku de mikansei kimi no tonari de
kawaita kokoro hotoge chi wo nagasu kedo
soba de iru no zutto yorisotte zutto
futari hikari no fune ni noru
kaze no hajimari no oto kanadeyou
Just live your life, do not give up now, keep moving on
And I will come for you over and over and over again
We will find each other soon enough
By the faintest glimmer of starlight
I know you, I know you
It is been billions of years, but now we can open the door to our legend
I crossed over the deep blue void
so I could burn to ash along with you
I have had a long journey on the vast wheel of fate, gathering sorrows along the way
I am not perfect, but I am giving all I have
If I open my fragile heart to you, I know I will bleed...
But I will always be with you, always be in your arms
We will get on a shining ship of light
And call forth the wind with our voices
yume kara sameta ato mo kanashii sora miteta
kono kimochi happa no ue ni susunderu
asatsuyu wo ochiru oto ni mimi wo sumaseteru no
kamisama anata ga tsukutta sekai wa kanpeki ja nai
koko de wa mainichi koi ga boroboro shindeku
hajimete suki ni natta no wo anata wa shiranai deshou
chikyuu no uragawa de ii kara soba ni ite hoshikatta
watashi wo wasuretemo ii kara soba ni ite hoshikatta
on the road on the hill that leads to you
When I woke from the dream, the sky still looked sad
My feelings drift on a leaf in the wind
I am straining my ears for the sound of the dew falling
God in Heaven, this world You made is far from perfect
Down here, love is shattered day by day
You do not know what it is like to fall in love for the first time
Let it be on the other end of the world, but I wanted to be with him
You were to forget me, I wanted to be with him
yume kara sameta ato mo kanashii sora miteta
kono kimochi happa no ue ni susunderu
asatsuyu wo ochiru oto ni mimi wo sumaseteru no
kamisama anata ga tsukutta sekai wa kanpeki ja nai
koko de wa mainichi koi ga boroboro shindeku
hajimete suki ni natta no wo anata wa shiranai deshou
chikyuu no uragawa de ii kara soba ni ite hoshikatta
watashi wo wasuretemo ii kara soba ni ite hoshikatta
on the road on the hill that leads to you
When I woke from the dream, the sky still looked sad
My feelings drift on a leaf in the wind
I am straining my ears for the sound of the dew falling
God in Heaven, this world You made is far from perfect
Down here, love is shattered day by day
You do not know what it is like to fall in love for the first time
Let it be on the other end of the world, but I wanted to be with him
You were to forget me, I wanted to be with him
All of you are going to be born again!
And I will be waiting for you!
As time flows on, we are all being born moment by moment and reborn moment by moment.
The instant that nothing becomes something...
Those who do not complete the rite of passage will not grow.
Being reborn from the darkness was a good trial for them.
Do what he said and get away!
We are just up against a person!
Show me what you learned in hand-to-hand training!
I will handle this with my holes!
That Special Training of the Grave really worked!
They are a really good team.
It is like they are synchronized!
The wife is supporting the husband.
He reversed that filling power into an opening power!
You get your hands off of Mix!
Do not you dare get between me and my wench.
Are you calling Mikono a wench?
He can even reverse damage he takes?
They are locked straight onto the thing he wants...
I am only playing the air and the earth.
I have learned to play the dissonance of your tone's inversion.
He inverted it in one beat.
The savage strike of a beast.
You think he is into Mikono?
Tell me another reason for a boy to chase a girl like that.
Ooh, how about a boy and another boy?
You are not getting away from me!
According to Malloy's report, he is taken Mikono and is hiding in the city.
You guys search on the ground.
I am just going to kill you.
Hurry up and get me back.
Of course I hear you, beast of love.
Cannot I be mean for just a little while?
What you desire is already in your grasp.
Do not say stuff just to make me feel better.
He is not going to hurt Mikono.
You are not destined to be with her, Amata.
Why do you keep insulting me?
What did I do to you?
You were on Vega, that is what.
Not in a place like this...
If you say so, I will stop.
You want me to lick you too?
Underneath the Tree of Life, on the day the world began.
The great Tree of Life governed the lives of all the creatures of the world,
and of the very planet itself.
As the two races waged war,
the Wings of the Sun awakened and pollinated the tree.
But the flowers wilted before they could bear fruit.
Eventually, the earth would be unable to support life.
Apollon and Sylvie separated to protect the Tree of Life.
I will be waiting for you.
Even if I have to wait for 12,000 years.
I will be back for you in 12,000 years.
Are you saying Mikono is Sylvie?
How could you even think that?
It is related to Cayenne's vision of the wedding in mourning clothes.
You saw that too, did not you, Amata?
Apollon and Sylvie are just a story!
I was actually a little glad.
If Mikono's destiny is with him,
then just maybe, you and I could...
Zessica, what are you talking about?
Do not scare me like that, Sylvie.
I resisted his power, just for a moment.
I will keep him busy for Mikono.
Damn it, he is being the hero.
I have to keep him on me until Mikono escapes!
As many times as it takes!
Am I going to die here?
I am sinking... into the darkness...
I am alone in the darkness again.
Amata Sora, do not be afraid.
The darkness is no longer a place to suffer in pain.
That is how you will become connected.
I am bound, alone in the darkness.
I have to free myself from my attachments and my past.
Why do not you stay down?
Why will not my power work?
Those free of attachments cannot be led astray!
Looks like I made it in time.
Do not let your guard down, Amata!
I am going to finish him off, so-
Our lives are on the line!
Like the butterfly, the symbol of rebirth,
The 12,000 year old smell of fate is bubbling up.
Let the stink take you, Sylvie.
It will only hurt to resist.
